data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jin, Chi, Yin, Xiangchu, Zhang, Feng (2015): A new species of the genus Utivarachna Kishida, 1940 (Araneae: Trachelidae) from China, with the first description of the male of U. fabaria Zhao & Peng, 2014 and a redescription of U. gui (Zhu, Song & Kim, 1998). Zootaxa 4057 (4): 569-581, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4057.4.6
